about.name: Instrument Information: NIMFR: derived total & aerosol optical depth from 1st Michalsky algorithm

citation: Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) user facility. 2000, updated hourly. Aerosol Optical Depth, derived from atmospheric extinction of solar irradiance (NIMFRAOD1MICH). 2000-04-28 to 2010-11-12, North Slope Alaska (NSA) Central Facility, Atqasuk AK (C2). Compiled by B. Ermold and C. Flynn. ARM Data Center. Data set accessed  at http://dx.doi.org/10.5439/1027370.
keywords: Aerosol Optical Depth, derived from atmospheric extinction of solar irradiance
name: NIMFR: derived total & aerosol optical depth from 1st Michalsky algorithm at Central Facility, Atqasuk AK - nsanimfraod1michC2.c1
